General.Name: Jayden Resources Inc.
General.Description: Jayden Resources Inc., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquiring, exploring, and developing interests in mining projects. It has an option to acquire 100% interest in the Storm Lake Gold property that consists of various contiguous claims covering an area of approximately 2,610 hectares located in the Frotet-Evans Greenstone Belt in central Quebec; holds interest in Outland Silver Bar properties; and holds 100% interests in Wheatcroft project covering an area of 97,501 hectares located in Kisseynew Domain in Northwestern Manitoba. The company was formerly known as Pinnacle Mines Ltd. and changed its name to Jayden Resources Inc. in June 2010. Jayden Resources Inc. was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1055 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2E9
